item.title: 雷诺首席执行官呼吁欧洲电动汽车过渡时间表具有灵活性
item.description: 雷诺首席执行官卢卡-德-梅奥（Luca De Meo）在周一出版的商业日报《回声报》（Les Echos）上发表评论时，对欧洲过渡到电动汽车的时间表表示怀疑，并补充说汽车制造商要想实现电动汽车目标，就必须降低成本。【原文：Renault's CEO Luca De Meo expressed doubts over the timeline for transitioning to electric vehicles in Europe, adding the carmaker has to bring down costs if it wants to deliver on its EV goals, in comments to business daily Les Echos published on Monday.】

item.title: 股价大涨后欧洲银行盈利成为焦点
item.description: 欧洲最大的银行将于本周公布第二季度财报，利率上调带来的收益是否已经耗尽，以及近期的政治风波是否会对市场情绪造成影响，都将成为各方关注的焦点。【原文：Europe's biggest banks report their second-quarter earnings this week, with all eyes on whether the gains from higher interest rates have run out of steam and if recent political drama is weighing on sentiment.】

item.title: 早间竞价拜登卸任，华尔街情绪低落
item.description: 韦恩-科尔对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望。【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Wayne Cole.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称英伟达正在为中国市场准备新版旗舰 AI 芯片
item.description: 三位熟悉内情的消息人士透露，英伟达正在为中国市场开发一款符合美国现行出口管制的新旗舰人工智能芯片。【原文：Nvidia is working on a version of its new flagship AI chips for the China market that would be compatible with current U.S. export controls, three sources familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 中国下调短期和长期利率
item.description: 中国央行周一将短期和长期利率下调了 10 个基点，称其目的是支持经济增长。【原文：China cut short and long-term rates by 10 basis points on Monday, with the central bank saying it was aiming to support growth.】

item.title: 新鹏与大众成立项目公司，推出全新电动汽车架构
item.description: 中国电动汽车（EV）制造商新鹏汽车周一表示，该公司已与德国大众汽车公司（Volkswagen AG）合作成立了一个工程师项目室，以加快电动汽车新架构的开发进程。【原文：Chinese electric vehicle (EV) maker Xpeng said on Monday it has established a project house in partnership with German automaker Volkswagen AG for engineers to accelerate the development process of new architecture for EVs.】

item.title: 拜登结束竞选连任，美元走低；降息后人民币持稳
item.description: 美国总统乔-拜登（Joe Biden）决定结束竞选连任，为另一位民主党人挑战唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）扫清了道路。【原文：The dollar eased on Monday in the initial reaction to U.S. President Joe Biden's decision to end his reelection campaign, clearing the way for another Democrat to challenge Donald Trump.】

item.title: 投资者寻找美国开始降息的迹象，油价上涨
item.description: 周一早盘，油价上涨，因为投资者在密切关注预计最快将于 9 月开始的降息周期的迹象。【原文：Oil prices rose in early trade on Monday as investors keep a lookout for signs of a rate-cut cycle expected to begin as soon as September.】

item.title: 中国意外下调关键利率支持经济
item.description: 周一，中国出人意料地降低了关键的短期政策利率和基准贷款利率，试图刺激世界第二大经济体的增长。【原文：China surprised markets by lowering a key short-term policy rate and its benchmark lending rates on Monday, in an attempt to boost growth in the world's second-largest economy.】

item.title: 拜登退出，亚洲股市谨慎；华尔街未受影响
item.description: 亚洲股市周一表现谨慎，因为本周企业财报密集，将对科技股的高估值构成考验，而投资者希望美国通胀率的关键数据将缩小 9 月份降息的可能性。【原文：Asian shares tread cautiously on Monday ahead of a packed week of corporate earnings that should test the sky-high valuations of tech stocks, while investors hope a key reading in U.S. inflation will narrow the odds on a September rate cut.】

item.title: 航空峰会在飞机短缺和供应链动荡中开幕
item.description: 周一，航空业领导人将在伦敦郊外举行的一次大型峰会上会面，因为航空业正与供应链中断、飞机延误和碳减排计划的失败作斗争。【原文：Aviation leaders will meet at a marque summit outside London on Monday as the industry struggles with supply chain disruptions, aircraft delays and floundering plans to reduce carbon emissions.】

item.title: 解说员：美国副总统哈里斯对商业问题的看法
item.description: 美国副总统卡马拉-哈里斯有可能在 11 月的大选中成为民主党总统候选人。以下是她对一些重要商业话题的看法和行动。【原文：U.S. Vice President Kamala Harris is potentially poised to become the Democratic presidential nominee in the November election. Here are her views and actions related to some key business topics.】

item.title: 地缘政治超越通胀，成为主权财富基金最担心的问题
item.description: 英伟达（Invesco）周一公布的一项调查显示，对于管理着约22万亿美元资产的主权财富基金和中央银行来说，地缘政治竞争，包括中美之间正在酝酿的贸易战，现在已经超越通货膨胀，成为它们最大的担忧。【原文：Geopolitical rivalries, including brewing trade battles between the United States and China, now trump inflation as the biggest worry for sovereign wealth funds and central banks managing some $22 trillion in assets, an Invesco survey published on Monday showed.】

item.title: 美国交通部长就航班取消与达美航空首席执行官通话
item.description: 美国交通部长皮特-巴蒂吉格（Pete Buttigieg）周日与达美航空首席执行官进行了会谈，该航空公司自上周五以来因 IT 系统大面积故障取消了数千个航班，并在继续努力恢复运营。【原文：U.S. Transportation Secretary Pete Buttigieg spoke on Sunday with the CEO of Delta Air Lines, following the carrier's cancellation of thousands of flights since Friday due to a widespread IT-systems outage and as it continued to try to restore operations, a department official told Reuters.】

item.title: 拜登退出美国总统竞选后，标准普尔 500 指数电子盘上涨
item.description: 在美国总统乔-拜登结束连任竞选，并支持副总统卡马拉-哈里斯接替他成为民主党候选人，与共和党人唐纳德-特朗普竞争之后，美国 500 指数小型股期货在周日尾盘小幅上涨。【原文：S&P 500 e-mini futures were up slightly late on Sunday after U.S. President Joe Biden ended his reelection bid and endorsed Vice President Kamala Harris to replace him as the Democratic candidate against Republican Donald Trump.】

item.title: CrowdStrike 称大量受停电影响的设备已恢复运行
item.description: 网络安全公司 CrowdStrike 周日表示，因软件更新导致全球技术中断而受到影响的 850 万台微软设备中，有相当一部分已重新上线运行。【原文：Cybersecurity firm CrowdStrike said on Sunday that a significant number of the 8.5 million Microsoft devices that were impacted as a result of a global tech outage related to a software update were back online and operational.】

item.title: 独家：流向俄罗斯的芯片非法交易有所放缓，但中国和香港仍是转运中心
item.description: 美国商务部此前未公开的数据显示，今年通过中国大陆和香港向俄罗斯运送的半导体和其他受限制商品减少了五分之一，但香港仍然是全球逃避制裁的热点地区。【原文：Semiconductors and other restricted goods shipped through China and Hong Kong to fuel Russia's war effort fell by a fifth this year previously undisclosed U.S. Commerce Department data shows, but Hong Kong remains a global sanctions evasion hotspot.】

item.title: 早间竞标处理拜登退出 11 月大选一事
item.description: 诺埃尔-兰德维奇（Noel Randewich）对亚洲市场未来一天的展望。【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets by Noel Randewich.】

item.title: 拜登退出可能刺激特朗普解除贸易协定，政府面临分裂
item.description: 美国总统乔-拜登（Joe Biden）周日退出总统竞选可能会促使投资者平仓押注共和党获胜将增加美国财政和通胀压力的交易，而一些分析师表示，市场可能会从下届政府分裂的可能性增加中受益。【原文：U.S. President Joe Biden's exit from the presidential race on Sunday could prompt investors to unwind trades betting that a Republican victory would increase U.S. fiscal and inflationary pressures, while some analysts said markets could benefit from an increased chance of divided government under the next administration.】

item.title: 彭博社报道：美国监管机构私下发现半数大型银行风险管理薄弱
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周日报道，美国一家顶级银行监管机构的机密评估发现，在其监管的 22 家大型银行中，有 11 家对从网络攻击到员工失误等一系列风险的管理 "不足 "或 "薄弱"。【原文：A top U.S. bank regulator's confidential assessments found 11 of the 22 large banks it supervises have "insufficient" or "weak" management of a broad swath of risks ranging from cyberattacks to employee blunders, Bloomberg News reported on Sunday.】

item.title: 投资者对拜登退出总统竞选的反应
item.description: 美国总统乔-拜登（Joe Biden）周日结束了他的连任竞选活动，因为民主党同僚对他的心智和击败唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的能力失去了信心，这使得总统竞选陷入了未知领域。【原文：U.S. President Joe Biden ended his reelection campaign on Sunday after fellow Democrats lost faith in his mental acuity and ability to beat Donald Trump, leaving the presidential race in uncharted territory.】

item.title: 全球网络中断后更多美国航班被取消
item.description: 据数据跟踪机构 FlightAware.com 称，受周五全球网络中断事件影响，周日有 1200 多架次航班被取消，其中以达美航空（Delta Air Lines）和美国联合航空公司（United Airlines）为首。【原文：More than 1,200 flights have been canceled within, into or out of the U.S. on Sunday, led by cancellations in top carriers Delta Air Lines and United Airlines , according to data tracker FlightAware.com, in the wake of Friday's global cyber outage.】

item.title: 空中客车公司寻求在太空和卫星领域创造规模的机会
item.description: 空中客车公司首席执行官纪尧姆-福瑞（Guillaume Faury）周日表示，空中客车公司正在寻找机会，在国防、太空，特别是卫星市场创造规模。【原文：Airbus is looking at opportunities to create scale in defence, space and particularly satellites markets, CEO Guillaume Faury said on Sunday.】

item.title: 空中客车公司称航空公司收益率压力尚未影响喷气机需求
item.description: 空中客车公司飞机制造主管克里斯蒂安-舍勒（Christian Scherer）周日表示，有迹象表明航空公司的收益率在下降，但这尚未影响到对新飞机的需求。【原文：There are some signs of a decline in airline yields but this is not yet affecting demand for new aircraft, Airbus's planemaking chief Christian Scherer said on Sunday.】

item.title: 波音高管称飞机制造商已确定解决 MAX 7 结冰问题的设计方案
item.description: 波音公司的商用飞机主管表示，该飞机制造商已经确定了解决发动机防冰系统问题的设计方案，该问题已严重推迟了737 MAX 7的认证，并表示可能在明年完成修复。【原文：Boeing's commercial airplane chief said the planemaker has settled on the design to address an engine anti-ice system that has significantly delayed certification of the 737 MAX 7 and suggested a fix could be completed by next year.】

item.title: 波音公司 "克服困难 "建造新的 "空军一号 "飞机
item.description: 波音公司国防部门负责人周日表示，这家飞机制造商仍在 "克服困难 "建造两架被称为 "空军一号 "的美国总统专机。【原文：The head of Boeing's defense unit said Sunday the planemaker is still "fighting through challenges" in building two delayed U.S. presidential aircraft known as Air Force One.】

item.title: 保时捷可能入股电池制造商 Varta，作为重大改革的一部分
item.description: 德国电池制造商瓦尔塔公司（Varta）周日表示，该公司正在讨论两种重组方案，有可能导致豪华跑车制造商保时捷入股该公司。【原文：German battery maker Varta on Sunday said it is discussing two restructuring scenarios that could potentially lead to luxury sportscar maker Porsche taking a stake in it.】

item.title: 波音公司 737 MAX 工厂生产大幅改善
item.description: 波音公司商用飞机总裁斯蒂芬妮-波普（Stephanie Pope）周日在伦敦参加一个小组讨论时对媒体说，波音公司737 MAX工厂的生产有了明显改善。【原文：Boeing has seen significant improvement in production in its 737 MAX factory, the company's commercial airplanes president, Stephanie Pope, told media on Sunday as part of a panel in London.】

item.title: 巴西航空工业公司的夏娃公司推出飞行出租车原型，2027 年前可满足现金需求
item.description: 电动飞机制造商伊夫首次展示了其 "飞行出租车 "的全尺寸原型机，这是该公司力争在 2026 年获得认证并投入使用的一个里程碑。【原文：Electric aircraft maker Eve has showcased for the first time the full-scale prototype of its "flying taxi," achieving a milestone as the company aims to obtain certification and enter service in 2026.】

item.title: 厄瓜多尔与智利子公司 ENAP 重新谈判石油协议
item.description: 厄瓜多尔能源部周六在基多表示，厄瓜多尔与智利国有石油公司ENAP的一家子公司就厄瓜多尔亚马逊地区一个石油区块的现有开采协议进行了重新谈判，到2035年将追加投资9000万美元。【原文：Ecuador and a subsidiary of Chile's state-owned oil company ENAP renegotiated an existing agreement for the exploitation of an oil block in the Ecuadorian Amazon, with an additional investment of $90 million until 2035, the Ministry of Energy in Quito said on Saturday.】
